1.content:
Ryan Alexander was in the familiar position of being stuffed into a garbage can.

"Look, he can still fit in it!" said Miles, their leader. The school had purchased cans with smaller openings, but Ryan was still as thin as a rail.

"Oh, leave him alone" said Gretchen, Miles' girlfriend, and long-time crush of Ryan.

"Yeah, whatever" said Miles as he left.

Ryan desperatley hoped Gretchen couldn't see the erection he gotten when she reached in and pulled him out.

"Jeez, Ryan, you got to stand up for yourself"

For the first eight years of their lives, Gretchen and Ryan had been friends. They never officially 'stopped' but when Gretchen was judged 'hottest girl ever,' she went out more, while Ryan stayed home watching TV.

"Yeah, sure" he stammered out.

"Take care this summer" she called out as she went to catch up with her friends.

--

Instead of going right home, Ryan had gone to the pharmacy.

"Hey" he asked a employee, "which of these powders will bulk me up the fastest?"

The employee, on his first day, struggled to remember his training. He looked at the backs of a couple.

"Uh, I think this one does the most" he finally said.

"Great, I'll take it!"

I'll show Miles, and all of them. Gretchen would finally notice him in August...

Unknown to Ryan, the powder was for those looking to gain muscle, but a compound created to help Aneroxic girls gain and maintain weight!
1.title: The Summer of Ryan

11.content:
The next day, Ryan also decided to join a gym, because he knew that powders alone wouldn't help him get big and strong. He hopped in his old car and headed to the other side of town, where he was sure that he wouldn't run into any classmates, and parked in the lot of The Weight Room. It was an older gym that had clearly seen better days, but because it was run down it was also more affordable for a high school student like Ryan.

He entered the front door and headed for the check-in desk. Nobody was present, so he decided to ring the bell on the counter. As he reached for it, he heard a cheery voice behind him say, "Hey there."

Ryan turned to find another young man standing there, but he looked vastly different than Ryan - this teen was tall, about 6'3", had short blond hair and blue eyes, and clearly had been working out hard for quite a while. His white t-shirt and blue athletic shorts looked like they had been painted on, and their canvas was the most muscular body that Ryan had ever seen.

"Did you want to join the gym? Or are you just looking for a guest pass?"

"Um...um...um...," replied Ryan as he started to tremble with fear. All of the jocks he had ever known had picked on him, so he was instantly terrified of this gym employee.

The young man sensed their might be some sort of problem, so he reached out his hand and said, "My name is Tim. And you are..."

"R - R - R - Ryan." He held out his hand gingerly, and the two shook.

"Hey, Ryan, nice to meet you. Are you interested in joining our little family?"

"Y - Y - Y -Yes?"

Tim went to the water cooler and poured a small cup, which he then handed to Ryan. "Here, drink this. And come sit over here."

Ryan took a set near the check-in desk and drank the water, and Tim sat down beside him. "Feeling better?"

"Yes."

"Good, so what's up, Ryan? Why do you want to join this gym?"

Suddenly, the floodgates opened and Ryan spilled out all the reasons - the bullying, the teasing, and the girl.

Tim smiled. "Well, I can help you there, Ryan. When I started lifting, I was about your same size. But my father, the owner here, showed me all I needed to know about lifting weights, and soon my body went from little," he said as he flexed his right bicep, "to b-i-g."

Ryan's eye grew huge when he saw Tim's massive muscles. "You would do that for me?"

"Well, Ryan, I am the head trainer at this gym, so I promise to help you attain whatever goal you want."

Ryan thought about for a half-second and agreed. The pair went into the office and Ryan signed up for a three-month membership.

"OK, little buddy," said Tim, "I want you to come back tomorrow morning at 8:00am ready to work out. Eat a good breakfast, and bring me some of that weight gainer powder you bought - I want to check it out to make sure it is the right kind of stuff. If not, I have some free samples here you can use."

"I will, Tim. Thanks!"

"No problem, Ryan. Oh, and one more thing, so that I can design the right program, I need to know how big you want to get - are we talking swimmer's build, young jock, linebacker, or massive tank?

Ryan replied...
11.title: The next day

112.content:
Ryan thought for a moment. He really wanted to be big- bigger than Tim. He wanted to overwhelm any man in the room but Ryan didn't believe that was possible. He was 5' 10" but only 130 pounds with scrawny arms and a sunken chest. He felt like a little kid.
"Young jock." he answered. It was the best he could hope for. Maybe gain 20 pounds of muscle and fill out a t-shirt.
"OK, Ryan. That should be no problem, so long as you stay disciplined. Can you do that?"
"Yeah." Ryan answered. "I can do that."
"OK, here's how we will start. I want you doing weights and eating big until we start building some muscle. That sound good?"
Ryan nodded.
112.title: Young jock

choices: Don't sleep for 2 hours after drinking powder
Dont drink powder on a full stomach
Don't drink powder on an empty stomach
1123.content:
Ryan's tiny belly couldn't hold much food but he was committed. He always ate a bit more than he thought he could hold. Over time he found that his capacity got a bit bigger. He was working out too. He wasn't very strong but but he pushed himself and did whatever Tim told him. He could do more reps and he believed that he could see some muscle when he looked in the mirror but he was still 130 pounds. This wasn't going to be enough. He needed to use those weight gain powders.
Ryan took out the powder which he had stored away back before getting into the gym program. Now it looked like he needed it after all but where did he put the directions. He tried to remember what the clerk had told him.
Did he say 'with food', 'after food', before food'. Ryan couldn't remember. He didn't even know how to take it. Should he make a shake with it, mix it with juice. He just didn't know. Finally he decided that as skinny as he was, what difference could it possibly make. He would just mix a scoop with milk and chug.
Immediately he felt bloated as the drink filled his belly. He was sleepy too and lay down finally succumbing to sleep. All the while he was trying to remember something the clerk had said. but it wouldn't come.
"Oh well," he thought. "What difference could it possibly make/"

What had the clerk warned him not to do?
1123.title: One month later

11232.content: Hidden away in the trash can was the warning label. Ryan remembered the clerk warning him about something but he just didn't remember what. So when he finished eating he mixed up a batch of the powder and drank it down. If he had read the warning he would have learned that taken with food, the supplement expanded many times blowing up the stomach and creating more capacity. While Ryan napped, his flat stomach bowed up and out. Ryan slept through it all. Then gradually his belly shrank back to normal when the volume inside compacted. His stomach was permanently stretched however. causing
11232.title: Dont drink powder on a full stomach

choices: Searched the refrigerator for last night's leftovers
112321.content:
Ryan woke with a start. What was that noise? A thunder storm. The sun wasn't even up. He checked the time. 3:30. He groaned and turned over. Another rumble and Ryan realized that is was his belly- and that he was hungry. "Amazing," he thought.
He tried to go back to sleep but the rumbling continues and Ryan finally got up and went down to the kitchen to get something to eat.
Food had never been important to Ryan. It was just something that happened. His mother always encouraged him to eat breakfast before school but he usually just nibbled. Now his belly was telling him that it needed to be filled and wasn't going to settle for nibbled or be ignored. He'd never cooked anything in his life, didn't know how to start but maybe he could make some toast.
Two slices of buttered toast later, it seemed that the emergency was past. The rumbling stopped and so had the hunger pangs. But curiously Ryan didn't go back to bed. Instead he
112321.title: Big hunger pangs.

1123212.content:
Ryan maneuvered carefully up the stairs, the weight of his belly keeping him off balance. He had finished raiding the refrigerator for leftovers from last night's dinner- half a roast chicken, scalloped potatoes, some baked beans from last weekend, some other stuff he didn't recognize. He didn't stop until there wasn't food remaining. All the while his belly was blowing up bigger and bigger. Now grunting, huffing and puffing with pleasure at the pressure in his belly he lay back on his bed, belly rising high and round.

He put his hands on it to massage it a big and a big gassy belch erupted from his mouth pleasantly relieving the pressure on his gut. He drifted off to sleep, snoring softly at first and then louder.
When he work in the morning, his belly was
1123212.title: Searched the refrigerator for last night's ...

choices: Ryan stars having a flatutance problem
13.content:
It had been a month since Ryan started taking the powder, but it felt like he wasn't getting any results. He hadn't gotten any more muscles or such.

Right now he was laying on the couch, watching TV, and eating a bowl of M&Ms.

April, his younger sister, walked in.

"Ooh, candy" she said, reaching for the bowl.

"They're mine!" said Ryan, moving the bowl close.

"Come on, I just want a few"

"Get your own!"

April moaned.

"Fine, whatever. Keep your food, fatass"

"What?"

Ryan was no stranger to April's insults, but this was a new one. He was thin as a stick, he-

But now that she mentioned it, hadn't his clothes felt tighter?

"Uh, have you looked at yourself in the mirror recently?" asked April.

Ryan got up and walked over to the mirror in the hallway. His face was fuller, and had the hint of a double chin. Standing sideways, he noticed how his stomach now stood out, as did his ass.

"Someone's getting pear-shaped" laughed April.
13.title: The next month

choices: Ryan tries to exercise the weight off
131.content:
"Good God! You've been taking this how much?"

Ryan was blushing. He'd gone for a check-up with his doctor, and was now naked save for his underwear.

The doctor poked him in his new gut, which giggled. He also inspected his chest, which seemed to show signs of ... no, it couldn't be.

"I'll stop" Ryan said.

The doctor shook his head.

"I'm afraid it's too much late for that. This is only the beginning. And due to the formula, well..."

"What?" asked a panicked Ryan.

"Your body will be taking on a, well, feminine build."
131.title: Go see a doctor

choices: Ryan attempts to lose some weight
1311.content:
"You see Ryan," said his doctor, trying to find the words to describe the situation to him, "This isn't your regular protein powder or anything of the like."

"Mhhm,"

"This powder is used primarily to help severely underweight girls gain weight," he paused, showing him the powder, "Its packed full of estrogen, appetite stimulants, and some products which theoretically can slow down your metabolism."

The doctor stopped once more, waiting for Ryan to connect the dots himself- however he still didn't seem to get it,

"And even if you had only taken small amounts of this, changes would be visible. But the fact that you've taken such large quantities for almost a month explains your- er... physical changes."

As Ryan had previously noted, he had gained a fair bit of weight- a lot of it in his butt, hips and thighs- which was explained by the estrogen. As the doctor had pointed out, he was also seemingly developing a pair of breasts that were small now, but wouldn't be for long.

"There's an excess of the formula in your system," the doctor continued, "So unfortunately, changes will continue to manifest themselves-"

"But what if I work out- could I lose the weight?"

"Well," the doctor though for a second, "It would be hard- you'd have to limit your caloric intake and work out hard, but yes- hypothetically speaking- you should be able to lose the weight. I remind you, with your metabolism, which is now shot and your increased appetite, it will be very hard, but don't give up."

"Thanks Doc..." said Ryan, shocked at the predicament he had put himself in. He had hoped to return to school bigger- but not like this!
1311.title: Ryan tries to exercise the weight off

choices: about a recall just issued on those pills and the grim reason why...
he had some different pills he wanted to prescribe that may or may not help.
13111.content:
On the way home Ryan stopped at the warehouse store. He needed some better fitting work out clothes if he planned on being serious with this exercise goal.

He grabbed a pair of black sweats from the women's section that had twin white strips going down each shoulder. Embarrassing as it was he had no other choice, the male sweats didn't have enough room in the rear for him now. The aroma from the bakery tickled his nose. He had to admit he was very hungry, but if he had any hope of losing this weight and becoming normal again he had to stick to a strict diet.

He quickly walked past the bakery to avoid further temptation and got in line. Now he had his eyes on the candy bars. His stomach growled loudly. He felt like he was starving. Just one candy bar wouldn't hurt, just for right now then not anymore. He couldn't decide on a flavor so he grabbed two.

When he got home he changed into his new workout clothes and went out for a jog. His stomach bounced up and down with every footstep and he could feel his ass doing the same, he felt humiliated. When he got just to the end of his street he was out of breath... and hungry again. This was going to be more work than he thought. Then his phone started ringing. It was the doctors office.

The doctor made a discovery he had to share with you, it was...
13111.title: Ryan attempts to lose some weight

choices: You go down to eat breakfast
1312.content:
It had been a few days since the doctor's appointment. That doctor was crazy, Ryan thought. I'll just work out, eat a little better. Starting tomorrow. Or the next day.

He had just gotten up, and felt something weird, around his chest.

He moved his hands to them, and gasped at what he felt.

He could feel them jiggle as he rushed to the mirror, but was still shocked when he looked in the mirror after taking his shirt off. He had boobs. Girl boobs.
1312.title: Ryan grows boobs

choices: Still in effect and some muscles are starting to develop?
He's on and off of his plan, but still gaining some mass?
He's fallen off the plan and the new weight is all fat?
132.content:
"Someone's getting pear-shaped" laughed April still from the couch.
"Be quiet," Ryan barked and walked into the bathroom and locked the door for privacy.
Ryan looked back at himself in the bathroom mirror and saw that he had indeed put on a little weight, mostly around his midsection. His hips we're a little wider, his belly had a gentle curve to it and his butt was sticking out a bit more. His pants felt a little tighter as Ryan ran his hands over his waist and thighs.
Sure he wasn't muscular nor was he huge but he was Bigger none the less.
"It's a start," smiled Ryan as he slapped his rounder butt," I bet if I take more powder and work out a bit more I can make some of this turn to muscle..."
Ryan left the bathroom and went to his room and grabbed the powder and downed a second dose of it and decided to plan what to do.

A week later Ryan's plan of working out is..
132.title: Take more of the powder

choices: Take another dose and eat big!
Get back to the pharmacist and get some answers!
Quit the stuff and go on a diet!
1323.content:
The first day after taking a second dosage of the powder went off as planned. Ryan pumped some iron on the little weight set his dad owns, took a jog, did some sit ups, push up, lunges and more. He worked up a sweat and thought about how much bigger he could become. A teen hulk made him smile deep down. Too big to fit into lockers or trash bins, big enough to intimate his enemies. Just big.
The next day Ryan had not got around to his little work out plan, same with the next... And the next day as well. In fact a whole week had gone by and the only real activity Ryan had done was walk to the store and carry back a 10 pound bag of groceries for his mom.
At the same time, unbeknownst to Ryan, his appetite was slowly growing larger by the day.

It was now a week after the second treatment when Ryan was having lunch at MacDonalds. He had ordered two burgers, some fries and a large chocolate milkshake. He was munching down when he saw a huge man, maybe 400 pounds walk by with his own tray full of food and his massive gut smack right into a chair and caused a loud ruckus as the chair jumped and slid across the floor. The loud noise jarred Ryan out of his eating trance and notice the large man. He was massive. There was no way that man would ever fit into a locker or a trash bins. His thick legs were likely the size of Ryan's waist. He looked like he could get stuck in one of the booths or have troubles fitting through narrow doorways. He was massive.
A little something started to stir in Ryan. He put down the burger and whiped off his hands and felt his own little belly. It had grown a bit bigger. It pushed forward ever so slightly over his tight waist band. Ryan also noticed his once really loose 28" pants were getting pretty soon tight. He was getting fatter.
It wasn't the muscle he wanted but he felt bigger. He looked over at the 400 pound man who had taken his seat in a chair and awed over the man. The man's ass filled and overflowed over the seat while his thick back spilled over the back of the chair. His massive belly spilled forward on to his lap and stretched his shirt tight showing off every curve if his massive gut, thick love handles, bountiful man boobs, and other rolls.

What does Ryan decide to do?
1323.title: Observing a Big Guy

choices: "I think women's clothing would fit you better"
134.content:
Ryan sweated as he entered the store.

By now it was impossible to dismiss his sister's 'fatass' statement. All of his new weight seemed to be fat, it appeared.

A tall brunette walked over to you.

"Hello sir, do you need any help?"

"Uh, I've, uh, gained some weight, and I need new clothes"

"Uh huh. Well, we'll have to measure you. Come with me"

Measure?

---

Ryan's cheeks were bright scarlet. He was now almost naked, saved for his underwater, stretched to the limt on his now ample ass.

"Here we go" said the clerk, removing the measure tape from his stomach. Now, let's see ... hmmm"
134.title: One month later

choices: He tries to think of an excuse
14.content:
He couldn't go.

No fucking way.

"Ryan, I'm leaving now."

It had been a month before he read the label. A month of drinking three of the powders a day. And that was when he realized that the weight he'd been gaining was not just some weird qurik of the drink, as his little sister was telling him.

By then he had gained 30 pounds. He tried to exercise it off, but if exercise was hard before...

Not only that, but because he had drank more than the recommended dose, his doctor explained, the stuff was so deeply embedded in his body he would still gain weight.

He was now 100 pounds heavier than before the summer.

"I'm sure your friends won't care" his mother said.

Who knows, they might not have, assuming he had any. But the jocks ... if he was a target before...

He had tried to get him switched to another school. He'd still be fat, but at least he would want to face his classmates, who he swore all last year would return strong.
14.title: First day of school

choices: He runs into Miles and Gretchen
Hungry, he goes to the cafeteria
142.content:
He looked again at the mirror.

His face was fuller, with chubby cheeks and a double-chin. He had 'moobs,' and was wearing a bra under his black shirt (his mother assured him no one would see it, but he wasn't sure)

The real gain was below the waist. His stomach stook out, exposed under his shirt, already the largest one he'd ever worn. A spare tire of flesh hung over his pants.

His hips were wider than his sister's, and he had an ass that would rival the Kardashians. Even in these large pants he felt constricted, like they would tear any minute.

Well, he couldn't put it off any longer. Time to go to school...
142.title: He faces the music.

choices: The bell rings, and Miles and Gretchen leave him
Ryan tries to make up an excuse to leave.
1421.content:
It was only a short flight of stairs, but Ryan felt exhausted by the time he reached the doors to his school. He wiped his brow, and realized that he was already sweating, confirmed by the sweat stains on his shirt.

"Oh God, look at that guy!" he heard someone say. He turned to see two freshmen girls giggling, trying not to look like they were looking at him.

He entered the hallway, and headed for the fountain.

"Well, whose this?" said a familar voice.

Oh God no. He knew it was inevitable, but he hoped for just a little more time...

He turned to see Miles. Worst of all, Gretchen was right beside him.

Miles mouth spread into a shit-eating grin.

"Well, it's our friend Ryan!"

Gretchen's face seemed to be a mixture of pity and shock.

"Ryan, what happened... I mean, you, uh" she stammered.

"Yeah, he bulked up alright" said Miles.

"I, uh, have to go to class" said Ryan, wanting to run far away.
1421.title: He runs into Miles and Gretchen

choices: Class ends, and Ryan realizes he's stuck in the desk.
14211.content:
Ryan had never been so relieved to hear the bell.

"I have to go!"

Ryan turned and headed for class as fast as he could. Which wasn't very fast, as his thick legs forced him into a sort of waddle. He could feel his belly shaking, and turned red about realizing Miles and Gretchen could probably see his ass swaying too and fro.

---

Maybe they had gotten smaller desks over the summer, Ryan thought. In any case, he seemed to be the only one having trouble.

The small seat was less than the size of one of his ass cheeks, and he kept titling to one end or the other. And no matter how hard he sucked his stomach in, it was still a struggle to fit through the space between table and chair.

As he waited for class to start, he realized how hungry he was. He didn't bring any snacks, so he would have to wait until class ended. At least now that he was in school he couldn't eat all the time.
14211.title: The bell rings, and Miles and Gretchen leave him

choices: He tries to exuse himself to go the bathroom
142112.content:
Ryan tried to pay attention in class, but his thoughts drifted to candy bars. Or chips. Or maybe pizza...

No, he to stop stuffing his face if he was going to get thin.

"Excuse me?" said a feminine voice.

Ryan managed to turn without moving his desk, and saw that Christy Reynolds was sitting beside him. Christy was almost up there with Gretchen. They never had much encounters, either good or bad.

"Uh, yeah Christy?"

"I'm having a hard time seeing the board. Could you, uh"

"Oh, sure" said Ryan, as he tried to scrunch down.

"Thanks" said Christy, in a tone that indicated Ryan hadn't really helped.

At least class is almost over, thought Ryan.

Then, he felt a sensation that had become very familiar that summer.

Oh no. Not here.

It seemed one of the side-effects of the powder was to make one gassy. He had gotten pills to help, but...crap, he forgot to take them!

He felt the pressure building up below...
142112.title: He becomes gassy during class.

1421122.content:
Before he could think, he felt it escape.

PHFFFFTTT

"Oh God!" screamed Christy, covering her nose.

The rest of the class broke out into laughter.
1421122.title: He lets loose.

choices: He has to run the track
Gretchen is in his gym class
1423.content:
He just managed to fit in his gym clothes.

His shirt only went down to his mid drift, leaving his flesh stomach and love handles on display for all to see, and his moobs were clearly apparent.

His ass looked like a balloon, and he felt it wobble behind him as he walked. His legs were like tree trunks.
1423.title: First class: gym.

14231.content:
Ryan was actually good at running the track; not the best, but he managed. That was last year, however.

Everyone ran past him. 30 seconds in, and he was covered in sweat.

He felt his body jiggling, his ass bouncing up and down.

By now his classmates were entering the second lap. A girl slowed down by him.

"Hey, don't worry, you're doing great" she said.

Ryan was too exhausted to talk, but smiled.

"Just imagine you're chasing an ice cream truck" she continued, then took off laughing.
14231.title: He has to run the track

choices: Gym starts, he doesn't have to answer.
14233.content:
Ryan was still trying to pull his shirt down furthur when he heard a distinctive laugh.

Oh God, not her, not here!

Gretchen and her BFF Christy were coming in, dressed in tight clothing that left little to the imagination.

Before he could try to hide, they spotted him.

"Oh my God!" said Christy, her face breaking into a grin.

"Ryan?" asked Gretchen.

Ryan's face was bright red.

"Hey Gretchen" he squeaked out, "I, uh, put on a little, eh-"

"You didn't put on a little anything" said Christy, as she walked up to get a closer look.

"Are those boobs?" she asked.
14233.title: Gretchen is in his gym class

info.brief_description: Ryan resolves to get strong for Senior year, but a misreading causes trouble...
info.description: For all his life Ryan has been a weakling, targeted by jocks and ignored by girls. He resolves his final year of high school will be different, and he resolves to get buff during the summer. However, a bulk up powder misreading could screw up his plans...,
